pages.text: ā’imirowochachewi bezīhi yazwachewalini? āyidelemi be’iwinetu inerisu weseni ālafīwochi ḥizibochi nachewi፡፡
iwinetenyochimi bīẖonu meselu yeẖoneni nigigiri yamit’u፡፡
weyisi yale ānidachi (fet’arī) tefet’eruni? weyisi inerisu fet’arīwochi nachewini
weyisi semayatinina midirini fet’eruni? āyidelemi āyaregagit’umi፡፡
weyisi yegētahi gimija bētochi inerisu zenidi nachewini? weyisi inerisu āshenafīwochi nachewini
weyisi le’inerisu be’irisu layi (kesemayi) yemīyadamit’ubeti meselali ālachewini? ādimach’achewimi (semahu bīli) gilits’ini āsireji yamit’a፡፡
weyisi le’irisu sētochi lijochi ālutini? le’inanitemi wenidochi lijochi ālwachihuni
weyisi wagani tit’eyik’achewalehini? silezīhi inerisu ke‘idawi yetekebedu nachewini
weyisi ruk’u misit’īri inerisu zenidi newini? silezīhi inerisu yits’ifaluni
weyisi tenikolini (banite) yishaluni? inezīyami yekaduti inerisu betenikoli teshenafīwochi nachewi፡፡
weyisi le’inerisu ke’ālahi lēla āmilaki ālachewini? ālahi kemīyagaruti hulu t’era፡፡
kesemayimi k’urach’ini (be’inerisu layi) wedak’ī ẖono bīyayu noro «yihi yetederarebe demena newi» yilu neberi፡፡
yaninimi be’irisu yemīgigedelubetini k’enachewini isikemīgenanyu diresi tewachewi፡፡
tenikolachewi ke’inerisu mininimi yemayit’ek’imachewinina inerisumi yemayiriredubetini k’eni (isike mīgenanyu tewachewi)፡፡
le’inezīya lebedelutimi kezīhi lēla k’iribi k’it’ati ālilachewi፡፡ gini ābizanyawochachewi āyawik’umi፡፡
legētahi firidimi tageši፡፡ ānite bet’ibek’achini wisit’i nehina፡፡ gētahinimi bemitinesa gīzē kemamesigeni gari āwedisewi፡፡
kelēlītumi āwedisewi፡፡ bekewakibiti medabek’īya gīzēmi (nigati layi āwedisewi)፡፡
